p: These findings demonstrated that the essential oil obtained from C. khasianus is a potential alternative for the treatment of various pathogenic bacterial strains and its combination with streptomycin had synergistic interaction against E. coli, which can reduce the effective dose of streptomycin and CKEO both. Hence, in the future after properly addressing toxicity and safety-related issues, CKEO or its combination can be used in human health.
